#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>
using namespace std;
long long int a[2000001];
int main(){
  int t,n,m,i;
  ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
  cin>>t;
  while(t--){
    cin>>n>>m;
          a[0]=0;
          a[1]=1;
     for(i=2;i<=2*n;++i){
          a[i]=(a[i-1]+a[i-2])%m;
    }
    cout<<a[2*n-1]<<"/"<<a[2*n]<<endl;
  }
  return 0;
}
